terms.text: help
/help/
http://www.gstatic.com/dictionary/static/sounds/lf/0/h/he/hel/help%23_gb_1.mp3
/hɛlp/
to make it easier or possible for somebody to do something by doing something for them or by giving them something that they need
幫助；協助；援助
Help, I\x27m stuck!
救命，我被卡住了！
He always helps with the housework.
他總是幫着做家務。
I need contacts that could help in finding a job.
我需要能幫我找到工作的社會關係。
We must all try and help each other.
我們都必須努力互相幫助。
Jo will help us with some of the organization.
喬將幫我們做一部份組織工作。
The college\x27s aim is to help students (to) achieve their aspirations.
大學的目標是幫助學生實現他們的抱負。
This charity aims to help people (to) help themselves.
這個慈善機構的宗旨是幫助人自力更生。
Come and help me lift this box.
來幫我抬這個箱子。
She helped (to) organize the party.
她協助籌備了晚會。
to improve a situation; to make it easier for something to happen
改善狀況；促進；促使
It helped being able to talk about it.
能談談這件事很有好處。
It doesn\x27t really help matters knowing that everyone is talking about us.
知道大家都在議論我們也於事無補。
This should help (to) reduce the pain.
這個應有助於減輕痛楚。
to help somebody move by letting them lean on you, guiding them, etc.
攙扶；帶領
She helped him to his feet.
她扶他站了起來。
We were helped ashore by local people.
我們被當地人救上岸。
to give yourself/somebody food, drinks, etc.
為（自己╱某人）取用
If you want another drink, just help yourself.
你要是想再喝一杯就請自便。
Can I help you to some more salad?
再給你來點色拉好嗎？
to take something without permission
擅自拿走；竊取
steal
He\x27d been helping himself to the money in the cash register.
他一直在偷現金出納機中的錢。
somebody can (not) help (doing) something
somebody can not help but do something
used to say that it is impossible to prevent or avoid something
某人忍不住（或無法抑制）做某事；不可能避免某事
I can\x27t help thinking he knows more than he has told us.
我總覺得他沒把他知道的事全告訴我們。
She couldn\x27t help but wonder what he was thinking.
她不禁琢磨着他在想些什麼。
It couldn\x27t be helped(\x3d there was no way of avoiding it and we must accept it).
這是不可避免的。
I always end up having an argument with her, I don\x27t know why, I just can\x27t help it.
我總是和她意見不合，鬧得不歡而散，我不知道為什麼，我就是忍不住。
I couldn\x27t help it if the bus was late(\x3d it wasn\x27t my fault).
公共汽車晚點了，我沒辦法。
She burst out laughing─she couldn\x27t help herself(\x3d couldn\x27t stop herself).
她突然大笑起來  她控制不住自己。
give/lend a helping hand
to help somebody
幫助；伸出援助之手
God/Heaven help somebody
used to say that you are afraid somebody will be in danger or that something bad will happen to them
（表示擔心某人將有危險或有難）
God help us if this doesn\x27t work.
如果這個行不通，那就要靠上帝了。
so help me (God)
used to swear that what you are saying is true, especially in a court of law
我發誓，上帝作證（尤用於法庭）
help somebody off/on with something
to help somebody put on/take off a piece of clothing
幫某人脫╱穿衣服
Let me help you off with your coat.
我來幫你脫大衣吧。
help out
help somebody↔out
to help somebody, especially in a difficult situation
幫助某人擺脫（困境）
He\x27s always willing to help out.
他總是急人之難。
When I bought the house, my sister helped me out with a loan.
我買這所房子時，我姐姐借給了我一筆錢解了急。
the act of helping somebody to do something
幫助；協助；援助
Thank you for all your help.
感謝你的一切幫助。
Do you need any help with that?
這事你需要幫忙嗎？
Can I be of any help to you?
我能幫你什麼忙嗎？
None of this would have been possible without their help.
如果沒有他們的協助，這事沒有一樣能辦成。
She stopped smoking with the help of her family and friends.
她在家人和朋友的幫助下戒了煙。
advice, money, etc. that is given to somebody in order to solve their problems
有助益的東西（如忠告、錢等）
to seek financial/legal/medical help
尋求經濟╱法律╱醫療援助
The organization offers practical help in dealing with paperwork.
這個機構提供文件處理方面的實際幫助。
You should qualify for help with the costs of running a car.
你應該符合條件獲取養車補助。
a help key/screen(\x3d a function on a computer that provides information on how to use the computer)
幫助鍵╱屏幕（計算機中提供計算機使用信息的功能）
the fact of being useful
有用
The map wasn\x27t much help.
這張地圖沒多大用處。
With the help of a ladder, neighbours were able to rescue the children from the blaze.
鄰居們借助一把梯子把孩子們從大火中救了出來。
Just shouting at him isn\x27t going to be a lot of help.
光是對他大喊大叫不會有多大用處。
the act of helping somebody who is in danger
救助
Quick, get help!
快，找人援救！
She screamed for help.
她高聲喊救命。
a person or thing that helps somebody
有幫助的人（或事物）
She was more of a hindrance than a help.
她非但沒幫上忙，反而礙事。
Your advice was a big help.
你的建議很有幫助。
You\x27re a great help, I must say!
我得說，你可沒少幫忙！
a person who is employed by somebody to clean their house, etc.
清潔工；僕人
The help hasn\x27t come this morning.
清潔工今天上午還沒來。
home help
there is no help for it
it is not possible to avoid doing something that may harm somebody in some way
沒辦法；別無選擇
There\x27s no help for it. We shall have to call the police.
沒法子了。我們只得叫警察了。
help

aid: the activity of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort or purpose; \x26quot;he gave me an assist with the housework\x26quot;; \x26quot;could not walk without assistance\x26quot;; \x26quot;rescue party went to their aid\x26quot;; \x26quot;offered his help in unloading\x26quot;
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://wordnetweb.princeton.edu/perl/webwn?s\x3dhelp\x22\x3ehttp://wordnetweb.princeton.edu/perl/webwn?s\x3dhelp\x3c/a\x3e

give help or assistance; be of service; \x26quot;Everyone helped out during the earthquake\x26quot;; \x26quot;Can you help me carry this table?\x26quot;; \x26quot;She never helps around the house\x26quot;
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://wordnetweb.princeton.edu/perl/webwn?s\x3dhelp\x22\x3ehttp://wordnetweb.princeton.edu/perl/webwn?s\x3dhelp\x3c/a\x3e
improve the condition of; \x26quot;These pills will help the patient\x26quot;
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://wordnetweb.princeton.edu/perl/webwn?s\x3dhelp\x22\x3ehttp://wordnetweb.princeton.edu/perl/webwn?s\x3dhelp\x3c/a\x3e
aid: a resource; \x26quot;visual aids in teaching\x26quot;
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://wordnetweb.princeton.edu/perl/webwn?s\x3dhelp\x22\x3ehttp://wordnetweb.princeton.edu/perl/webwn?s\x3dhelp\x3c/a\x3e
be of use; \x26quot;This will help to prevent accidents\x26quot;
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://wordnetweb.princeton.edu/perl/webwn?s\x3dhelp\x22\x3ehttp://wordnetweb.princeton.edu/perl/webwn?s\x3dhelp\x3c/a\x3e
avail: a means of serving; \x26quot;of no avail\x26quot;; \x26quot;there\x26#39;s no help for it\x26quot;
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://wordnetweb.princeton.edu/perl/webwn?s\x3dhelp\x22\x3ehttp://wordnetweb.princeton.edu/perl/webwn?s\x3dhelp\x3c/a\x3e

Help (styled as HELP) is a six-part Australian documentary series is broadcast on SBS One that takes you inside the real-life events that Ambulance officers and paramedics face every day while on the job. Since 2010, the program is currently airing on Tuesday afternoons at 3pm.
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help_%28Australian_TV_series%29\x22\x3ehttp://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help_(Australian_TV_series)\x3c/a\x3e
\x26quot;Help\x26quot; is the fourth episode of the seventh and final season of the television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer.
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help_%28Buffy_the_Vampire_Slayer%29\x22\x3ehttp://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help_(Buffy_the_Vampire_Slayer)\x3c/a\x3e

In computing, help is a command in various command line shells such as COMMAND.COM, cmd.exe, 4DOS/4NT, Windows PowerShell, Bash, Singularity shell, Python and GNU Octave. It provides online information about available commands and the shell environment. It is analogous to the Unix man command.
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help_%28command%29\x22\x3ehttp://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help_(command)\x3c/a\x3e

Help (हेल्प) is a 2010 Bollywood horror film starring Bobby Deol and Mugdha Godse in the lead roles. The film marks the debut of Sophia Handa, in a supporting role, and Rajeev Virani, making his directorial debut. Shreyas Talpade have a special appearance in the film. ...
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help_%28film%29\x22\x3ehttp://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help_(film)\x3c/a\x3e
Help is a Dutch television drama series first broadcast by the NCRV in the early 1990s.
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help_%28Netherlands_TV_series%29\x22\x3ehttp://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help_(Netherlands_TV_series)\x3c/a\x3e
Online help is topic-oriented, procedural or reference information delivered through computer software. It is a form of user assistance. ...
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help_%28online%29\x22\x3ehttp://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help_(online)\x3c/a\x3e

Action given to provide assistance; aid;  A person or persons who provide assistance with some task;  A person employed to help in the maintenance of a house;  Correction of deficits, as by psychological counseling or medication or social support or remedial training;  To provide assistance to ...
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/help\x22\x3ehttp://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/help\x3c/a\x3e
(Helping) drive hundreds of millions of dollars in sales for clients
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://www.write-concepts.com/about/\x22\x3ehttp://www.write-concepts.com/about/\x3c/a\x3e
(Helping) it is crucial to help one\x26#39;s coworkers, which is the general theme of teamwork.
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://www.reference.com/browse/teamwork\x22\x3ehttp://www.reference.com/browse/teamwork\x3c/a\x3e

(Helps) (antilepseis, opitulationes).—A charisma connected with the service of the poor and the sick performed by the deacons and deaconesses (Acts, vi, 1). The plural is used to mark the many forms assumed by this ministry.
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://oce.catholic.com/index.php?title\x3dCharismata\x22\x3ehttp://oce.catholic.com/index.php?title\x3dCharismata\x3c/a\x3e

Homebuyer Education Learning Program; an educational program from the FHA that counsels people about the home buying process; HELP covers topics like budgeting, finding a home, getting a loan, and home maintenance; in most cases, completion of the program may entitle the homebuyer to a reduced ...
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://www.nwmhousingsearch.org/aboutus/definitionsacronyms.html\x22\x3ehttp://www.nwmhousingsearch.org/aboutus/definitionsacronyms.html\x3c/a\x3e
Display help on a shell built-in command.
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://tldp.org/LDP/Bash-Beginners-Guide/html/gloss.html\x22\x3ehttp://tldp.org/LDP/Bash-Beginners-Guide/html/gloss.html\x3c/a\x3e
You can type HELP at any time to ask what options you have, or to ask what any command does. The character HELP is really C-h. See section Help.
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://www.cs.utah.edu/dept/old/texinfo/emacs19/emacs_40.html\x22\x3ehttp://www.cs.utah.edu/dept/old/texinfo/emacs19/emacs_40.html\x3c/a\x3e
help refers to a resource offering help.
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml/vocab/\x22\x3ehttp://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml/vocab/\x3c/a\x3e
opens these Help pages. When you click on this link, you will go to the section appropriate to the page you are on.
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://www.oed.com/public/home/home-page\x22\x3ehttp://www.oed.com/public/home/home-page\x3c/a\x3e
The first Multics help facility simply printed out system \x26quot;info segments\x26quot; with pauses. Over time this code became more and more elaborate. ...
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://www.multicians.org/mgh.html\x22\x3ehttp://www.multicians.org/mgh.html\x3c/a\x3e
a special page on some websites where you can find assistance if you get lost or confused
\x3ca href\x3d\x22http://www.kyvl.org/kids/glossary.html\x22\x3ehttp://www.kyvl.org/kids/glossary.html\x3c/a\x3e

pressing the F1 key usually brings up a help screen which provides further information associated with the field or window that is currently active.
